name: Space Survival (itch) (XxsupergamerxX)
description:
This is a game where you're a spaceship dodging enemy spaceships. If you have any ways i can improve it please tell me in the comments. And tell me your highest score!

POSSIBLY coming soon: I plan on making an online mode where you can have tournaments against friends and see who gets the highest score! And maybe you could play me ;)

Extra notes: Sorry if it takes a long time for the music to load. Fullscreen Recommended
